description: Infusion is a different kind of application framework, created by a different kind of community. Built on top of jQuery, it includes a powerful Inversion of Control (IoC) system for creating highly flexible applications. Built specifically with usability and accessibility in mind, Infusion radically reinvents the role of a JavaScript framework. No black boxes: everything in Infusion is designed to be modified, reworked, and adapted to suit your—and your users—needs.
name: Infusion
